description:
Pack on. Skis strapped in. Dawn breaks as you begin the ascent. By lunch, a thousand feet of powder awaits. Another perfect weekend. Carefully crafted with essential performance elements and a timeless big-mountain inspired graphic, this long sleeve half zip is expertly cut from recycled polyester, designed for ultimate performance and freedom of movement to explore in every direction imaginable. Inspired by big terrain. Crafted for you.
Why they made it: Ski & Snow, Moderate Intensity, Hiking, Outdoor, Everyday
name: Odlo Whistler Eco Turtle Neck LS 1/2 Zip - Mens
